I recently moved to another town. I was very anxious on the first day I didn't know anyone. I went to the classroom and entered the room. While I was entering the room, I felt that everybody's eyes were on me I became even more anxious then. Fortunately, Mrs. Dian, the civic teacher, was right behind me. She greeted me and introduced me to the class. It turned out that my classmates were friendly. They showed me around and helped me get to know the school. At the end of the day, I was less and less anxious. I will always remember my first day at my school. Posted by Rafi

related_questions.question:
Alas sebuah prisma berbentuk segitiga siku-siku dengan panjanh sisi 8 cm,15cm dan,17cm.luas permukaan prisma jika tingginya 20 cm adalah..    a.860 cm²
b.880cm²
c.920cm²
d.1.042cm²
bntu y kakk ;)​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

c

Penjelasan dengan langkah-langkah:

luas alas = ½ x a x t = ½ x 8 x 15 = 60 cm²

keliling = 8 + 15 + 17 = 40

luas permukaan = 2 x 60 + 40 x 20

= 120 + 800

= 920 cm²

related_questions.question:
Volume Balok Kayu Di Atas Adalah


Jawab Ya:))​

answers.answer:
Penjelasan dengan langkah-langkah:

Diketahui :

P = 50 cm

L = 20 cm

t = 15 cm

Ditanya : Volume

Dijawab :

V = P × L × t

V = 50 × 20 × 15

V = 15,000 cm3

 Semua benda logam adalah benda padat.

related_questions.question: Diketahui koordinat titik P =(1,2) dan koordinat titik Q =(4,-6) maka panjang vektor posisi PQ adalah.

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Panjang vektor posisi PQ adalah (3, -8)

Penjelasan dengan langkah-langkah:

vektor posisi PQ

= (4 - 1 , (-6) - 2)

= (3, -8)

Jadi, panjang vektor posisi PQ adalah (3, -8)

related_questions.question: Perhatikan gambar 120 derajat 7 x + 8 derajat nilai x adalah​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

ᴊᴀᴡᴀʙᴀɴ ᴅᴀɴ ᴘᴇɴʏᴇʟᴇꜱᴀɪᴀɴ₊˚ˑ༄ؘ

tentukan nilai x!

kedua sudut saling berseberangan, maka :

120⁰ = 7x + 8⁰

120⁰ – 8⁰ = 7x

112⁰ = 7x

x = 112/7

x = 16⁰

[opsi B]

━━━━━━━━━━━◦ ❖ ◦━━━━━━━━━━━

Detail Jawaban

  • Mapel : Matematika
  • Kelas : VII (7 SMP)
  • Materi : Bab 3 – Garis dan Sudut
  • Kode soal : 2
  • Kode kategorisasi : 7.2.3
  • Kata kunci : Menentukan Nilai x Dari Sudut Berseberangan

related_questions.question: Tuliskan jari jari lingkaran yang mempunyai luas 100.69cm

answers.answer:
Jawab:

0,808598 cm

Penjelasan dengan langkah-langkah:

Luas lingkaran = π x r²

    100,69 cm² = 22/7 x r²        

    100,69 cm²/22/7 = r²  

    0,65383 cm² = r²

    0,808598 cm = r

Jadi, jari-jari dari lingkaran tersebut adalah 0,808598 cm.
